summary: This bill, the Federal Accountability Committee for Transparency Act (FACT Act), amends the CARES Act to extend the Pandemic Response Accountability Committee (PRAC) through December 31, 2026, and renames it the Fraud Prevention and Accountability Committee. The bill makes conforming amendments throughout the CARES Act, updating references to the committee and relevant sections of the U.S. Code. Further, any existing references to the original committee name are replaced. The bill aims to promote government transparency and accountability in financial matters related to the CARES Act.
